name: Detroit City
description:
This game was made as part of the Lost Cartridge Jam, 2021.  

You control seven missile launchers and try to destroy all enemy planes. Initially, you have 100 missiles, but if you destroy the warships that float on top, you get 5 missiles every time. Also, watch out for the missiles fired by the warships and all the enemy planes that come down as time passes. If the enemy planes destroy all your missile launchers or if you have no more missiles left, then the game ends.

How long can you survive???

Controls:

x - To start the game.

R - To restart the game.

Spacebar - To launch the missiles.

Left and Right Arrow Keys - To select one of the other missile launchers (You can still press left and right arrow keys at the first and the last launchers respectively, they are cyclic).

Note:

If you didn't understand the instructions, it's fine. The game is pretty much self-explanatory. Post your best times in the comments down below. Let me know if there's anything I can add to this game.

Thank you.

-------------------------------------------------

BACKGROUND MUSIC

Mountain Trials by Joshua McLean.
